ygData.subject: SORRY Call if you need help
ygData.msgSnippet: If you received an email from me with a attachment pretty park.exe DO NOT OPEN IT.  I was sent a virus that sends out an email to everyone on your email
ygData.messageBody:
If you received an email from me with a attachment pretty park.exe DO NOT
OPEN IT. I was sent a virus that sends out an email to everyone on your
email address book with a copy of the virus attached. This is a
particularly difficult virus to remove. Please check
http://www.mcafee.com/, there you can get detailed instructions on how to
remove the virus. READ THE INFORMATION THERE BEFORE YOU REMOVE THE VIRUS.
If you have any questions after that please email me and I will help you.
Once again DO NOT OPEN anything with a attachment called pretty park.com.

Rick Gallatin
